summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3854 for the improvement of the alley in block 43, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, being the alley between 22nd Avenue, North and 23rd Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Aloha Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47193, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
